mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT J.*, S.NICKNAME FROM JOIN_BBS J, SPORT_USER S WHERE S.USERIDX = J.USERIDX) B) WHERE RNUM >= #{begin } AND RNUM <= #{end }
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM JOIN_BBS
SELECT J.*, S.NICKNAME FROM JOIN_COMMENTS J, SPORT_USER S WHERE S.USERIDX = J.USERIDX AND J.BBS_IDX = #{bbsIdx } ORDER BY COMMENT_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOIN_COMMENTS (COMMENT_IDX, BBS_IDX, USERIDX, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_TEAM_COMMENTS.NEXTVAL, #{bbsIdx }, #{useridx }, #{content },SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO JOIN_BBS (BBS_IDX, USERIDX, TEAM_IDX, SUBJECT, TIME, MEMBER_MAX, LIMIT, PLACE, EVENT, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_JOIN_BBS_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{useridx}, #{teamIdx}, #{subject}, #{time}, #{memberMax}, #{ limit}, #{place}, #{event}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
